channel.title: Comments on: Melt-Banana prepares for massive tour, supporting Tool in Arenas

item.title: By: josepfine
item.dc:creator: josepfine
item.description: Tool can suck my left nut, their music (if you can call it that) sounds like a pseudo-intellectual chad kroeger trying to pinch off a turd while reading kabbalah and reciting fibbonaci sequence. i’d rather not be a tool and just go see Melt Banana
item.content:encoded: Tool can suck my left nut, their music (if you can call it that) sounds like a pseudo-intellectual chad kroeger trying to pinch off a turd while reading kabbalah and reciting fibbonaci sequence. i’d rather not be a tool and just go see Melt Banana

item.title: By: superhell
item.dc:creator: superhell
item.description: melt-banana is its own gender love their music
item.content:encoded: melt-banana is its own gender love their music

item.title: By: mike roch
item.dc:creator: mike roch
item.description: melt banana can suck my left nut, their music (if you can call it that) sounds like a dying cat crossed with a whiny baby. i'd rather hang myself before i listen to that again
item.content:encoded: melt banana can suck my left nut, their music (if you can call it that) sounds like a dying cat crossed with a whiny baby. i’d rather hang myself before i listen to that again
